backend/main.mo: Defines actor with suit stats, module toggles, life support, environmental hazards, and system status structures, initializing all state maps and records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI styling, interaction polish, and layout-standardization features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, tabs, components, and state stores.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark mode overrides defining global HUD color tokens and layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing boot, display modes, tab switching, and global store resets with safety rules for tactical mode.
frontend/src/audio/audioBus.ts: Centralized audio bus handling SFX and voice playback with safe fallbacks and sequencing utilities.
frontend/src/audio/hevVoice.ts: HEV-style voice helpers providing module, hazard, stat, and system voice announcements gated by voiceEnabled setting.
frontend/src/audio/uiSfx.ts: UI sound effect helpers for tab switches, toggles, console submissions, and button clicks.
frontend/src/components/audio/AmbiencePl: Audio player UI that manages playlist navigation, playback, loop, volume, and adding custom audio tracks.
frontend/src/components/boot/BootSequenc: Animated boot overlay that types system lines, plays audio cues, and fades out before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/hazards/Environm: Displays environmental hazard levels with icons and status classes based on severity.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudLayout.ts: HUD wrapper that applies layout modes, color schemes, scaling, and responsive landscape or compact behavior.
frontend/src/components/hud/HudOfflineOv: Simple overlay indicating the HUD is offline with a warning message.
frontend/src/components/hud/MinimalHudVi: Compact HUD showing key stats and a control to restore the full HUD mode.
frontend/src/components/hud/Panels.tsx: Reusable HUD panel components including stat meters, vitals panel, and layout containers.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalHudS: Tactical HUD layout with top/bottom bars, side modules, and stat panels surrounding central content.
frontend/src/components/hud/TacticalOver: Renders a tactical HUD overlay with frames, reticle, and multiple readouts including threat, combat mode, targeting, comms, and new tactical metrics.
frontend/src/components/info/CommandCons: Implements an interactive command console with history navigation, command execution, and auto‑scrolling output.
frontend/src/components/info/ConfirmActi: Provides a reusable confirmation modal using alert‑dialog components with customizable title, description, and actions.
frontend/src/components/info/SuitSubsyst: Displays suit subsystem and environmental readouts with toggles for voice, radio, HUD, and display mode, including confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/info/SystemLogVi: Shows a scrollable system log with timestamps, entry types, and messages.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalD: Displays a suit medical diagram with colored overlays showing health and armor status.
frontend/src/components/medical/MedicalR: Renders detailed medical stats such as vitals, trauma data, and hazard metrics based on suit state.
frontend/src/components/tactical/RadarPa: Draws an animated radar with sweep, rings, contacts, and status info using a canvas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login state, stored identities, and creation of an AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating suit stats and module states.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewportOrientatio: React hook that detects and tracks whether the viewport is in landscape orientation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining HUD color variables, CRT effects, layout rules, and visual theming.
frontend/src/lib/commands.ts: Parses console-style text commands to update suit stats, modules, hazards, and system settings via app state stores.
frontend/src/lib/glyphs.ts: Exports a set of monochrome Unicode glyphs used as HUD symbols for hazards and indicators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, providing InternetIdentity and React Query providers around the app.
frontend/src/state/audioState.ts: Zustand store managing audio playback, playlist handling, looping, volume, and custom track loading.
frontend/src/state/hazardAlerts.ts: Monitors hazard levels to trigger critical flashing and voice alerts using a timed checker and Zustand state.
frontend/src/state/hazardsState.ts: Zustand store managing environmental hazard levels with setters, aggregate calculation, status helpers, and reset.
frontend/src/state/infoSettingsState.ts: Zustand store managing HUD and UI settings with setters and reset.
frontend/src/state/suitState.ts: Zustand store handling suit stats and modules with value clamping and toggles.
frontend/src/state/systemLog.ts: Zustand store for system log entries with add and clear functions.
frontend/src/state/uiState.ts: Zustand store controlling landscape mode toggle and reset.
frontend/src/state/weaponSystemsState.ts: Zustand store for selected weapon, ammo type, and fire rate with simple setters.
frontend/src/tabs/BasicsTab.tsx: UI tab rendering core suit stats, hazards, and vitals panels.
frontend/src/tabs/InfoTab.tsx: UI tab showing subsystem readouts, system log, and command console.
frontend/src/tabs/MedicalTab.tsx: UI tab that displays medical readouts component.
frontend/src/tabs/SettingsTab.tsx: Settings UI enabling HUD, audio, display, and system restart controls.
frontend/src/tabs/TacticalTab.tsx: Tactical UI with radar, readouts, and contact list panels.
frontend/src/tabs/UtilitiesTab.tsx: UI for toggling suit modules and using the ambience player.
frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx: UI for selecting weapons, ammo types, and fire rates in a loadout system.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom radii, OKLCH color variables, typography, spacing tweaks, and animation/typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and feature requirements focused on applying Tactical‑tab visual styling and animations across all UI tabs.
